title: Top, Mid and Jungle are all mirror matches in my current game.

replies.body: Curious as to what are the 3 same champs in your game?

I enjoy a mirror match up, it either makes you feel special on your champ, or you learn a few things from the better one.

The only mirror match i hate is blitz sup. No matter how good or bad blitz they are, it just puts me off xD
How often do you see that happen?
I want to be in a match where everything is mirror. I think 3/5 is the closest I have been.
